Name: Goblin.Life
About the game: IMAGINATION WITH FRIENDS IMAGINE Imagine `DREAMS` to play within whole new worlds with a library of art of assets ready to go. Brush wall, ceilings, heights, item placements with powerful system based editing tools. Change the weather, spawns, or game mechanics with the powerful Astral 2D scripting layer. - Dream URL shareable, browser run-able multiplayer 3D worlds - Select and trigger BGM music in world - Script gameplay using a visual 2D grid editor, the same as the physical editor - Interweave `DREAMS` together with `GATEWAYS` creating a portal to the other world - Narration TTS glyphs allows for lore and discovery - `DREAMS` are remixable by prepending `/dream` in front of them, ie: `/dream/village` - `DREAMS` are down/uploadable and shareable as .goblin binary files FRIENDS The Goblins are social creatures and need constant help from their friends. They come in a variety of forms ranging from other Users, AIs, or rideable mounts! - Ride Llamas, Dinos, and carry each other in cartoony 3D worlds created by Friends like you. - Explore the evolving weave of `DREAMS` via `GATEWAY` - Frolic with the Goblins and see what they're up to. PLAY ANYWHERE - TOGETHER Play in your browser with links generated from your desktop client. Link Friends to `DREAMS` to play together regardless of platform. The Goblin.Life Website and Steam DEMO allow for playing `DREAMS` for free but do not provide the extent of imagination capabilities this purchase grants. Buy today and unlock your full Goblin.Life potential.
